inlineContent.text: E-Parcs is a sophisticated iOS application designed to enhance wildlife conservation efforts through digital patrol management, incident reporting, and real-time park monitoring. Built specifically for park rangers and conservation teams, the app provides tools for mission planning, geographic data collection, health status monitoring of park zones, and collaborative team management.
The application leverages modern iOS technologies including SwiftUI, MapKit, and The Composable Architecture (TCA) to deliver a robust, offline-capable solution for remote conservation work.
: Plan, assign, and track patrol missions with route planning and staff assignment
: Report and track wildlife incidents, poaching activities, and conservation observations
: Real-time health status visualization of park zones based on patrol frequency and decay rates
: Full functionality in remote areas with automatic sync when connectivity returns
: Staff management, role assignments, and mission coordination
: Photo and video documentation of incidents and observations
: Modern declarative UI framework for iOS interface
: Native iOS mapping and geographic data visualization
: Reactive programming for data flow management
: Backend-as-a-Service providing authentication, real-time database, and API services
: Client-side database with bidirectional sync capabilities for offline-first functionality
: PowerSync SQLite database for offline operations
: Automatic bidirectional synchronization with Supabase when online
: Built-in conflict resolution for collaborative editing
: Type-safe database schema definition using PowerSync Swift SDK
: Standard format for geographic feature storage
: PostGIS extensions for advanced geographic operations
: Custom polygon and point rendering with health status visualization

abstract.text: Electronic Parks Management System - A comprehensive wildlife conservation and anti-poaching mobile application for park rangers and wildlife conservationists.
Quick start guide for setting up and running the e-parcs application.
Database schema design decisions and the evolution of park block management in the e-parcs system.
Electronic Parks Management System - A comprehensive wildlife conservation and anti-poaching mobile application for park rangers and wildlife conservationists.
